page.title: 17CUSTOMS AND EXCISE
page.content:
The role of the Customs and Excise office is to enforce a wide variety of laws.They work in alliance with the Police concerning drugs,Department of Agriculture,Fisheries and Food checking food,animals and endangered species with or without a license,and the Home Office concerning the import of firearms and other offensive weapons.
The Customs and Excise officers check as many vehicles as humanly possible, without causing too many delays,for illegal goods entering and leaving the country or that goods have had the correct duties paid,firearms are licensed and any other offensive weapons are found.Another less prominent factor is the import of pornographic items.
